project.title: Beyond the Batey: Analyzing Historical and Contemporary Bomba Performances and Films
project.description: For this digital edition/exhibit, I have created annotations for the film Zafra: Fusion Familia Cepeda (1983) performed by Bellas Artes in San Juan Puerto Rico and featuring Don Rafael Cepeda, Jesus Cepeda, and Luis Palos Matos. These annotations include a transcription of the dialogue, notes instrumentation, piquetes, posturas, song names and lyrics, and the context surrounding the poems used. These annotations support my dissertation research for "Beyond the Batey: Building a Digital Community Archive. This project serves as a pedagogical open access digital tool for bomba practitioners learning the bomba's varied movement vocabulary.
project.creator: lexirosev16
project.authors: Alexis R. Velazquez, Jonas Martinez, Michael Stevens, William Miranda, Barbara Cepeda, Tata Cepeda
